trans-unit.source: Represents a response of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref>.
When you use the pack URI protocol, you can reference a package and its part elements either locally from inside a package or externally from a Web source.
For the pack URI protocol, the forward-slash characters (//) of an embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] are represented by commas (,,).
For example: `pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,folder,file.package/images/picture1.jpg` references the file `/images/picture1.jpg` that is contained in `http://www.adatum.com/folder/file.package`.
Closes the stream for this request.
Make certain that objects close when they are no longer in use so that resources are not exhausted.
Gets the content length of the response.
Checking this property on an actual Web request and matching response has performance implications because in some circumstances it requires that the whole response stream is read.
The content length, in bytes.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] content type of the response stream's content.
If a request does not specify a part in the package, it returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the package.
Requests that specify a part in the package return one of the following:
If the requested part contains a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value is returned.

If the requested part contains no <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value but the stream name contains a recognized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] extension type, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type corresponding to the extension is returned.

If the requested part does not contain a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> value nor a recognized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] extension type, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse.ContentType%2A> returns an empty string.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the stream's content.
Gets the response stream that is contained in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse"></xref>.
The response stream.
Gets the collection of Web <xref href="System.Net.WebResponse.Headers"></xref> for this response.
The collection of Web response <xref href="System.Net.WebResponse.Headers"></xref>.
Gets the inner <xref href="System.Net.WebResponse"></xref> object for the response.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse.InnerResponse%2A> returns `null` when the response is from the package cache (when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse.IsFromCache%2A> is `true`).
The response data as a <xref href="System.Net.WebResponse"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the response is from the package cache or from a Web request.
`true` if the response is from the package cache; `false` if the response is from a Web request.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the response.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the response.
